fields.label: Description
fields.description: The description of this new awesome Item

fields.label: Cover
fields.description: The cover img must be .png or .gif and at max 5mb lenght, due to users experience in IPFS download speed limitations (recommended size 350 x 200, 350 x 350 or 350 x 500)

fields.label: Cover HD
fields.description: No limitations for the HQ version of the image

fields.label: DeFi Cover
fields.description: A square .png or .jpeg cover 250px for DeFi standard applications.

fields.label: Animation
fields.description: An mp4, mp3 or gif file as a fancy animated version of your ITEM

fields.label: Background Color
fields.description: The background color used in most of the dapps behind your cover if not fixed with their standard image sizes

fields.label: Licence File
fields.description: A file that represent the legal licence of the ITEM (if Any). Accepted file: .pdf, .html, .md, .txt

fields.label: Discussion Link
fields.description: The link to the official social media discussion of the ITEM
